extendedInfo.description: â A great Spot the Difference game for everyone! â With 3 levels of difficulties for each scene, there is a challenge for everyone! A fun and addictive app for the whole family! In two levels, the clock is ticking - find all differences and avoid mistakes: each mistake will cost you time against the clock. Find Differences on the Farm Features - Beautiful high-quality images (farm and garden themes)- Addictive gameplay - Catchy sound effects and music! - Differences randomized on each play - 3 different difficulty levels (timer countdown in 2 of them) - Fun brain and memory training- educational game for kids, toddlers and their parentsVisual comparison:- comparing two or more things by eye. - first stage in a child's development of an understanding of geometry and measurementTheme description:You will find the differences in pet scenes (dog, cat), animal farm themes with farmers and donkeys. You will also see a hedgehog in nature, birds, frogs and a cute bee.  The perfect app for those who love Spot the Difference games, Find the Difference puzzles, hide and seek and photo hunt apps! The first 2 scenes of Find Differences on the Farm are free, the remaining 10 can be easily purchased via a single in-app purchase.We really appreciate your feedback - If you enjoy playing our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. Please consider that we cannot reply to your comments in the Appstore. If you have any questions or need our help, please use the given support link. Thank you!

reviews.title: Would be good...
reviews.comment: Would be good if you could play more than just 2 levels...
reviews.author: Gemma Eastham

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you for these games, it will keep the  children occupied
reviews.author: Shirley Allen
